alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:48PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Baker County through 330 PM PDT... At 248 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Little Lookout Mountain, or 19 miles east of Baker City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Little Lookout Mountain and Love Reservoir around 250 PM PDT. Sheep Mountain around 300 PM PDT. Richland around 310 PM PDT. Sparta around 320 PM PDT. Carson, Cornucopia and Halfway around 330 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
